name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This course provides an introduction to musicology, the study of music in its historical, cultural, and theoretical contexts. Topics include music theory, music history, and music analysis.

name: Musicology Fundamentals
description: This course provides an overview of the fundamentals of musicology. Topics include music theory, music history, and music analysis.

name: History of Music
description: This course provides an overview of the history of music from the Middle Ages to the present. Topics include medieval music, classical music, jazz, and popular music.

name: Music Theory
description: This course provides an overview of the fundamentals of music theory. Topics include scales, intervals, harmony, and musical forms.

name: Popular Music Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the study of popular music. Topics include the history and development of popular music, different genres and styles, and popular music analysis.
